attributes.action: Insist the new leader of the Conservative Party must have supported an exit vote
attributes.background:
The next Prime Minister should have voted for leaving the EU so we know they are in touch with the majority of voters that did.
A Prime Minster from the remain team would never have the respect or support of the public

rejection.details: The leadership of the Conservative party is a party political matter, and the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
